comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when export a report which extend crosstab from a library to a library.

Build number:
2.2.0.v20070418-1035

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report extend crosstab from a library.
2. Export the report to a library.

Expected result:
The report can be export to a library.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
